p.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent the patient's mental capacity to agree to their care plan.

p.strong: This is a preliminary set of value, for the full list consult the latest published version of the SNOMED CT subset with Original ID 29981000000132.

concept.displayName: Has mental capacity to give consent
Lacks capacity to give consent (Mental Capacity Act 2005)
